item.title: 分布式编程第二周课堂笔记
item.description: 本笔记来自课堂记录和课程网站的总结，转载请注明出处! Introduction to Sockets Lecture Summary: In this lecture, we learned about client-server programming, and how two distributed Java applications can communicate with each other using sockets. Since each application in this scenario runs on a distinct Java Virtual Machine (JVM) process, we used the
